Fine Artist, Graphic Designer, Web Developer, Art Director, Writer, Creativity Coach

Freelance Graphic Designer and Web Developer for audio-visual companies, advertising agencies, artists, small businesses, design studios, corporate in-house art departments, universities and municipalities, plus independent projects and assisting other designers• Experienced with all phases of digital print design and production• Experienced with web site design and development• Have worked on brochures, booklets, direct-mail, packaging, logos, business forms, 			invitations, booth display, PowerPoint presentations, CD covers, ads, newsletters, 			magazines, book covers and interiors, app icons, and online study guides• Experienced with identity and branding, both from scratch and within set guidelines• Proactive and experienced in project managementVisual Arts, Publishing, Writing:• Publisher, author, designer, production and content editor• Copywriting for small businesses• Exhibition planning and design for visual arts events• Editorial illustration• Art business coaching• Creativity coaching• Drawing and painting teacher• Highly skilled and original fine artistMusic Business Experience:• Copy writing and design of all promotional materials• Design and production of CD packaging.• Booth and banner design for conferences• Booking and coordinating performances• Implemented promotion and publicityPast and Present Clients Include:• The Inside-Out Center, Temple University, Philadelphia, PA• Witness to Innocence, Philadelphia, PA• Temenos Community, West Chester, PA• Acupuncture Center of Chico, Chico, CA• ExecEd, Rutgers University School of Business, Camden, NJ• PC Partners, Maple Shade, NJ• Studio D Fine Arts, West Palm Beach, FL• HeARTs for Autism, Philadelphia, PA• City of Hesperia, Economic Development, CA• Chevron, San Francisco, CA		• Monster Cable, Brisbane, CA• Amy Hosa Designs, San Francisco, CA• Hershey Multimedia, San Francisco, CA• The Studio of David Inocencio, San Francisco, CA• Fidelity, Boston, MA

Internet Video Marketing Strategist
January 13, 2010, R. was a client of Alexandria’s

I have chosen to work with Alexandria Levin on many occasions for the multiple skills and abilities she offers. The fact that she is multi-talented is the main reason I benefit from hiring Alexandria, as I can then be certain I will have a cohesive marketing plan as well as a strong internet presence. She develops professional and creative presentations and materials for me to choose from, but only after spending time with me to be certain she understands exactly what my ideas are. She is also very conscientious of deadlines, and makes every effort to meet them without sacrificing creativity or quality. I have hired Alexandria Levin exclusively in the past, and plan to continue to do so with future projects.

Aletta de Wal, M.Ed
Artist Advisor & Art Marketing Strategist at Artist Career Training; Certified Shift It Visual Coach
January 8, 2010, Aletta was a client of Alexandria’s

Alexandria Levin knows the challenges of making a living making art – and she does not shy from them. In fact, she finds creative ways to persevere and rise above them. As an author as well as an artist, Alexandria is generous with what she has learned. Patrice Federspiel told me about her book “Pricing Your Art With Confidence.” We are proud to feature it at The Art Business Library http://www.artbusinesslibrary.com/artist-money-matters/#pricingwithconfidence, along with recordings of TeleClasses on that topic. Her other book “Creatively Unblocking Creative Blocks” http://www.artbusinesslibrary.com/creatively-unblocking/ is a blockbuster of over 300 ideas for getting new projects underway or busting the demons who stop you. Aside from her art and writing talents, Alexandria is a reliable, professional businessperson. I am proud that she is an A.C.T. business affiliate and artist mentor http://www.artistcareertraining.com/coaching-with-alexandria-levin and she sets a high standard for others to follow

January 4, 2010, Lisa was a client of Alexandria’s

I have had the very good fortune to have Alexandria Levin work on annual projects for the City of Hesperia since 2006 and can recommend her without qualification for any artistic/creative endeavor in any medium.  Her artistic skills are unquestionably of the highest caliber and her attention to detail is nothing short of amazing.  She is a pleasure to work with and has always finished projects on time and within budget.  Most importantly to the marketing of the city, the collateral pieces have gained national recognition and each year sales people ask, “How will you top this next year?”  The answer is simple … I will hire Alexandria Levin!

Aletta de Wal, M.Ed
Artist Advisor & Art Marketing Strategist at Artist Career Training; Certified Shift It Visual Coach
January 11, 2010, Aletta worked with Alexandria in the same group

Aletta de Wal is an artist’s best friend. I began working with her as an affiliate as a result of my books; “Pricing Your Artwork With Confidence” and “Creatively Unblocking Creative Blocks”, which she promotes through Artist Career Training. I have since worked with her on developing tele-classes and other materials. Besides being a joy to work with, I am beyond impressed by her dedication, expertise and professionalism regarding the rights and responsibilities of visual artists in regards to their own careers. By doing the work she does, and by chipping away at set-in-stone stereotypes, she raises the bar significantly for both artists and the artworld. I highly recommend Aletta and A.C.T. for artists who need a boost in their career, and also for other art world professionals who need to know how it is to work professonally with artists.

summary: Beginning with creating punk rock record covers at night, while working a day job producing financial investment charts...I am a graphic designer, web developer, art director, fine artist, writer and creativity coach with organizational and project management skills. With years of experience in designing and producing a wide range of print and presentation materials, I have worked with an equally diverse clientele from individual artists to major corporations on a wide range of visual-based projects. I have been consistently involved with website design and development for the past sixteen years. Besides design and development, I offer website analysis, reorganization, updating, banners, color palettes, and designs and layouts, in any combination or in part, as well.My expertise is in being both logical and creative, intuitive and pragmatic. I work to seamlessly combine visionary and perceptive aesthetics, informed by a finely-tuned color sensibility, with an organizational approach that considers both the minute details and the big picture. The result is work that is clean, colorful, functional and professional.For super-creative, experienced, high-quality, organized and well-recommended personal service; contact me anytime. I am always looking to increase my clientele, seeking out new creative challenges, and offering a level of professional service that will help you successfully realize your next project.
name: Alexandria Levin
title: fine artist | graphic designer | web developer | art director | writer | creativity coach | project manager
